name: reflexion-agent-boilerplate
description: Production-ready implementation of Reflexion for language agents

scripts.lint: flake8 reflexion/ tests/ && pylint reflexion/ tests/
scripts.format: black reflexion/ tests/ && isort reflexion/ tests/
scripts.format:check: black --check reflexion/ tests/ && isort --check-only reflexion/ tests/
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && rm -rf build/ dist/ *.egg-info/ .pytest_cache/ .coverage htmlcov/

author: Your Organization
